org.chrisjr.loom

Class ConcretePattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chrisjr.loom.Pattern
      • org.chrisjr.loom.ConcretePattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class ConcretePattern
extends Pattern
    The implementation of a Pattern, which stores its output mappings and associated events/function. ConcretePatterns have no children and hold exactly one value at any given time.
    Author:
    chrisjr

      • forEach

        public static ConcretePattern forEach(Pattern other,
                      Double boundaryType)
        Generate a pattern of note on or note off events from the events of another pattern, depending on the boundary type desired.
        Parameters:
        other - the pattern to get events from
        boundaryType - the boundary type (note on == 1.0, note off == 0.5)
        Returns:
        a new pattern
        See Also:
        EventBoundaryProxy
